brief_summary: Modern SaaS email archive platform with AI-powered search. Targeting individuals, small businesses, and enterprises. Positioning: Premium features at mid-tier pricing.

core_values: Professional - Serious tool for serious needs

target_audience.secondary: Small business owners, HR departments, legal professionals

brand_identity.brand_voice: Professional but not corporate. Intelligent but not intimidating. Modern but not trendy. Trustworthy but not boring.
brand_identity.positioning: Think Dropbox meets Gmail meets modern SaaS aesthetics

recommended_concept.name: Infinite Archive
recommended_concept.description: Infinity symbol (∞) where each loop is formed by email/archive elements
visual_elements: Left loop: Stylized envelope or mail icon
recommended_concept.why_recommended: Unique, memorable, communicates core value proposition, scalable, not cliché

alternative_concepts.name: Search Archive
alternative_concepts.description: Magnifying glass with stacked envelope layers inside the lens
visual_elements: Optional: Subtle sparkle/AI element in lens

alternative_concepts.name: Letter E + Archive
alternative_concepts.description: Geometric letter 'E' with horizontal bars representing stacked mail layers

alternative_concepts.name: Cloud Archive Vault
alternative_concepts.description: Simplified cloud shape with envelope outline and security element

recommended.name: Professional Blue + Cyan
recommended.reasoning: Trust and technology (blue), modern and digital (cyan), professional enough for enterprises, approachable for individuals, high contrast for accessibility

alternatives.name: Warm Professional
alternatives.reasoning: Balance of trust + innovation, energy (amber for AI features)

characteristics: Excellent readability at small sizes (16px mobile)
NOT too corporate, NOT too playful

must_include: Works on light and dark backgrounds
must_avoid: No gradients (unless very subtle and modern)
No dated effects (drop shadows, bevels, glows)
No childish or overly playful elements
No clichés (@ symbol, obvious inbox icon)

variations: Dark mode version (adapted for dark backgrounds)
technical_specs.clear_space: Minimum = height of the 'e' in 'evermail' on all sides

concept_1_infinite_archive.prompt: Professional SaaS logo for 'evermail', an email archive search platform. Design concept: Elegant infinity symbol (∞) where the left loop is a stylized envelope icon and the right loop is a circular archive/database symbol, connected by smooth flowing lines. Style: Minimal, geometric, sophisticated, clean vector art. Colors: Deep blue #2563EB for main elements, bright cyan #06B6D4 for accent flow, slate gray #475569 for wordmark. Typography: Modern sans-serif 'evermail' in lowercase, medium weight, positioned below or to the right of icon. Inspiration: Stripe, Linear, Notion logos - clean, professional, scalable. No gradients, no shadows, flat design. White background. Professional but approachable aesthetic.
concept_1_infinite_archive.negative_prompt: no realistic images, no 3D effects, no drop shadows, no bevels, no clipart, no cartoons, no busy patterns, no dated effects, no @ symbols, no generic inbox icons, no childish elements

concept_2_search_archive.prompt: Modern logo for 'evermail' email archiving SaaS. Design: Clean magnifying glass icon where the lens contains 3-4 stacked envelope layers showing archive depth. Handle is minimal geometric line. Optional subtle sparkle in top-right of lens (AI hint). Style: Minimal geometric, professional, sophisticated. Colors: Deep blue #2563EB primary, bright cyan #06B6D4 accents on envelopes. Typography: 'evermail' in clean sans-serif below icon, slate gray #475569. Flat vector design, no shadows. Inspiration: Modern tech company logos like Stripe, Notion. White background.
concept_2_search_archive.negative_prompt: no realistic magnifying glass, no 3D effects, no shadows, no gradients, no clipart, no cartoons, no complex illustrations, no busy patterns

concept_3_letter_e_archive.prompt: Minimalist logo for 'evermail'. Design: Bold geometric letter 'E' where the three horizontal bars are represented as stacked envelope/mail layers, with subtle gaps between them to show depth. Negative space suggests envelope fold. Style: Geometric abstraction, minimal, sophisticated, modern. Colors: Deep blue #2563EB for main E, cyan #06B6D4 gradient flow on edges (very subtle). Typography: Continue with 'vermail' in matching sans-serif font, slate gray. Clean vector art, flat design, professional. Inspiration: Abstract tech logos. White background.
concept_3_letter_e_archive.negative_prompt: no 3D, no shadows, no complex illustrations, no decorative elements, no realistic textures, no cartoons

concept_4_cloud_vault.prompt: Professional logo for 'evermail' cloud email archive. Design: Simplified geometric cloud shape with subtle envelope outline integrated into the cloud form. Small minimal lock or shield icon at bottom-right (security element). Style: Minimalist, geometric, clean, modern. Colors: Deep blue #2563EB cloud, cyan #06B6D4 envelope outline, slate gray lock. Typography: 'evermail' below in modern sans-serif. Flat vector design, professional but approachable. No complex details. White background.
concept_4_cloud_vault.negative_prompt: no realistic clouds, no 3D effects, no shadows, no cartoons, no complex illustrations, no dated security icons, no clipart

generation_parameters.notes: Generate each concept separately. Prioritize Concept 1 (Infinite Archive) as recommended primary design.

avoid_similarity_to: Outlook - Blue O with envelope (too corporate, dated)
Proton Mail - Purple envelope with atom (too privacy-focused)
competitive_positioning.differentiation_strategy: Modern geometric abstraction with sophisticated color palette (blue/cyan). Avoid obvious envelope iconography. Focus on 'infinite' and 'search' concepts rather than just 'mail'.

must_achieve: Works beautifully on white, light gray, and dark backgrounds
Feels premium but accessible (not exclusive or intimidating)
Memorable enough to recall after seeing once
Scalable to future mobile app icon
success_criteria.quality_benchmarks: Should match quality and sophistication of: Stripe, Linear, Notion, Dropbox, Intercom

post_generation_steps: 1. Generate all 4 concepts using Nano Banana AI
3. Test on white and dark backgrounds
5. Refine selected concept(s) with design iterations
6. Hire designer to vectorize final selection (SVG format)
7. Create all required variations (icon only, wordmark only, monochrome)
8. Generate full asset library (PNG sizes, favicons, social media)
9. Document brand guidelines (colors, spacing, usage rules)
10. Implement across website, app, and marketing materials

designer_refinement.scope: Vectorize best concept, create variations, brand guidelines

total_estimated.deliverables: Complete logo system ready for production use
